recent_news: Green Marmot Capsule Hotel is a Zürich-based boutique hotel property — small, independent, traveler-focused
Tommy Fliski handles business development — he controls decisions about hotel partnerships and in-property promotions
Capsule/boutique hotels attract exactly the tech-savvy, independent traveler profile targeted by AURA (Quinn persona)
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: This is the single most operationally urgent contact. Vimo's most critical active task is securing one boutique hotel commitment for AURA QR card distribution before build begins — and Tommy is the BD lead at a boutique Zürich hotel. Green Marmot is an ideal AURA distribution partner: capsule hotel guests are solo/independent travelers who are tech-native, the hotel is small enough to move quickly on a pilot, and the cost to Tommy is zero (he just places QR cards). Message Tommy this week: 'Tommy — I am building AURA, a voice AI guide to Zürich's history for hotel guests. We are placing QR cards in 3 boutique Zürich hotels as a pilot — zero cost to the hotel, and guests get a free premium Zürich experience. Would Green Marmot be open to a pilot partnership? Happy to meet at the hotel this week.' This directly completes a critical active task.
